title.rendered: Improve Your ROI with Video Content Marketing

content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564516262362{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573232404080{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Get the infographic. Improve your ROI.

[vc_custom_heading text=”Gain insight from more than 70 agencies on what makes their video marketing tick.” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1508967230997{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508967240278{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]As you’re planning your video marketing strategy, check out this infographic for the latest trends and data. Hear from more than 70 agencies to gain insights into their goals, tactics and results.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Download the infographic to learn about:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1508967254027{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

  • What types of content are most effective
  • The top challenges in video marketing
  • The success rates video is delivering

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]
